name: Closed Circuit (itch) (Fmlad)
description:
Submission for the:
Minijam 97,  the theme is "Simulation" with the limitation where "Movement is Lethal"

Thank you for taking the time to play my incredibly short game.. (so hard to get much done in 72 hours solo)

Controls:
-> Explained in-game.

Bugs:
-> The game was built ideally on one mechanic... and that mechanic broke at the last moment and I never managed to get it fixed on time! Bah! So.. Whilst its very short.. its also super easy to complete. Apologies, looking to fixed it asap. (wont spoil the bug.. you will know when you see it....)

Big thanks to my friends below for their continued support to help me solve my issues when they arise. Thank you so much guys for always being there for my silly questions.
> Emma
> Joan Sol ROO

The Team:
Everything created by me, Fmlad. (excluding the audio, see below)

Pamgaea" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
